name: Legend of the Great Wheel
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36!! Theme: Ancient Technology. In this game you are an ancient robot Mouse Guardian in the Temple of the Great Wheel. You awaken after untold years in the temple to find that it has become overrun by strange, sentient plant creatures. You must restore power to the temple while avoiding the plants and find the Great Wheel to insure its safety.

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move. Space to interact.
